page.title: 06GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: There are several variations of chasing games.In{"Tiggy on High"}you are safe if standing on something off the ground. In{"Stuck in the Mud"}you must stand still with arms out and wait to be released by someone who's still "free".There are variations of {"Hide & Seek",}the most popular being {"Blocky"}where the object is to reach "home" before the seeker finds your hiding place or catches you. In{"Sardines"}everyone ends up in the same hiding place. There are variations of{"Grandmother's Footsteps sometimes involving letters as they occur in your name. Singing games are fairly common e.g.{"In and Out the Dusty Bluebells". Girls enjoy playing pretend games such as schools,hospitals etc.Boys tend to copy{TV programmes}such as "The A-Team" etc.
